com.facebook.stats

Interface GaugeCounter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventCounterIf<GaugeCounter>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeGaugeCounter, DefaultGaugeCounter, FastGaugeCounter

    public interface GaugeCounter
extends EventCounterIf<GaugeCounter>
    Like an EventCounter but with additional functionality and additional overhead.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(long delta, long nsamples)
      Like add(delta) but used for merging with other GaugeCounters.
      long getAverage()
      Average value of delta for calls to add(long delta).
      long getSamples()
      Number of times add(long delta) has be called.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.stats.EventCounterIf

        add, getEnd, getLength, getStart, getValue, merge

    • Method Detail

        Number of times add(long delta) has be called.

        Average value of delta for calls to add(long delta).

       long nsamples)
